A female patient childbearing potential ( premenopausal medical history ) must negative pregnancy test Day 0 use effective method birth control ( although birth control method 100 % effective , follow consider effective mean contraception : surgical sterilization , use oral contraceptive , barrier contraception use either condom diaphragm spermicidal gel , intrauterine device , contraceptive hormone implant patch ) Screening duration study . 7 . Patients receive periocular corticosteroid injection study eye 3 month prior screen . 3 .
